 java.lang.Boolean sendRemoteCursorEvent(java.lang.String streamid, java.util.Map messageObj)
           
 void sendUploadCompletMessageByPublicSID(org.apache.openmeetings.documents.beans.UploadCompleteMessage message, java.lang.String publicSID)
           
 void sendVarsByWhiteboardId(java.util.ArrayList whiteboardObjParam, java.lang.Long whiteboardId)
          This Function is triggered from the Whiteboard
 int sendVarsModeratorGeneral(java.lang.Object vars)
           
 java.lang.Long setBroadCastingFlag(java.lang.String publicSID, boolean value, java.lang.Integer interviewPodId)
           
 java.util.Map setConnectionAsSharingClient(java.util.Map map)
           
 void setNewCursorPosition(java.lang.Object item)
           
 org.apache.openmeetings.data.whiteboard.dto.RoomStatus setRoomValues(java.lang.Long room_id, java.lang.Boolean becomeModerator, java.lang.Boolean isSuperModerator, java.lang.Long organization_id, java.lang.String colorObj)
          This function is called once a User enters a Room It contains several different mechanism depending on what roomtype and what options are available for the room to find out if the current user will be a moderator of that room or not

Some rules:
If it is a room that was created through the calendar, the user that organized the room will be moderator, the param Boolean becomeModerator will be ignored then In regular rooms you can use the param Boolean becomeModerator to set any user to become a moderator of the room
If a new moderator is detected a Push Call to all current users of the room is invoked "setNewModeratorByList" to notify them of the new moderator

At the end of the mechanism a push call with the new client-object and all the informations about the new user is send to every user of the current conference room
 void setSipTransport(java.lang.Long room_id, java.lang.String publicSID, java.lang.String broadCastId)

          this must be set _after_ the Video/Audio-Settings have been chosen (see editrecordstream.lzx) but _before_ anything else happens, it cannot be applied _after_ the stream has started!

 void syncMessageToCurrentScope(java.lang.String remoteMethodName, java.lang.Object newMessage, boolean sendSelf)
          General sync mechanism for all messages that are send from within the scope of the current client, but: optionally do not send to self (see param: sendSelf) do not send to clients that are screen sharing clients do not send to clients that are audio/video clients (or potentially ones) do not send to connections where no RoomClient is registered
 void syncMessageToCurrentScope(java.lang.String remoteMethodName, java.lang.Object newMessage, boolean sendSelf, boolean sendScreen)
          General sync mechanism for all messages that are send from within the scope of the current client, but: optionally do not send to self (see param: sendSelf) send to clients that are screen sharing clients based on parameter do not send to clients that are audio/video clients (or potentially ones) do not send to connections where no RoomClient is registered

logicalRoomLeave

public void logicalRoomLeave()
this means a user has left a room but only logically, he didn't leave the app he just left the room FIXME: Is this really needed anymore if you re-connect to another scope? Exit Room by Application

                             boolean removeUserFromSessionList)

currentClient -
currentScope -

applyForModeration

public java.lang.Long applyForModeration(java.lang.String publicSID)
Invoked by a User whenever he want to become moderator this is needed, cause if the room has no moderator yet there is no-one he can ask to get the moderation, in case its a Non-Moderated Room he should then get the Moderation without any confirmation needed

返回：
Long 1 => means get Moderation, 2 => ask Moderator for Moderation, 3 => wait for Moderator

getBroadCastId

public long getBroadCastId()
there will be set an attribute called "broadCastCounter" this is the name this user will publish his stream

返回：
long broadCastId

setUserAVSettings

public org.apache.openmeetings.persistence.beans.room.Client setUserAVSettings(java.lang.String avsettings,
                                                                               java.lang.Object newMessage,
                                                                               java.lang.Integer vWidth,
                                                                               java.lang.Integer vHeight,
                                                                               long room_id,
                                                                               java.lang.String publicSID,
                                                                               java.lang.Integer interviewPodId)
this must be set _after_ the Video/Audio-Settings have been chosen (see editrecordstream.lzx) but _before_ anything else happens, it cannot be applied _after_ the stream has started! avsettings can be: av - video and audio a - audio only v - video only n - no a/v only static image furthermore

参数：
avsettings -
newMessage -
vWidth -
vHeight -
room_id -
publicSID -
interviewPodId -
返回：
RoomClient being updated in case of no errors, null otherwise

checkRoomValues

public java.lang.Boolean checkRoomValues(java.lang.Long room_id)

setRoomValues

public org.apache.openmeetings.data.whiteboard.dto.RoomStatus setRoomValues(java.lang.Long room_id,
                                                                            java.lang.Boolean becomeModerator,
                                                                            java.lang.Boolean isSuperModerator,
                                                                            java.lang.Long organization_id,
                                                                            java.lang.String colorObj)
This function is called once a User enters a Room It contains several different mechanism depending on what roomtype and what options are available for the room to find out if the current user will be a moderator of that room or not

Some rules:
  • If it is a room that was created through the calendar, the user that organized the room will be moderator, the param Boolean becomeModerator will be ignored then
  • In regular rooms you can use the param Boolean becomeModerator to set any user to become a moderator of the room

If a new moderator is detected a Push Call to all current users of the room is invoked "setNewModeratorByList" to notify them of the new moderator

At the end of the mechanism a push call with the new client-object and all the informations about the new user is send to every user of the current conference room

参数：
room_id - - id of the room
becomeModerator - - is user will become moderator
isSuperModerator - - is user super moderator
organization_id - - organization id of the user
colorObj - - some color
返回：
RoomStatus object

setUsernameReconnect

public org.apache.openmeetings.persistence.beans.room.Client setUsernameReconnect(java.lang.String SID,
                                                                                  java.lang.Long userId,
                                                                                  java.lang.String username,
                                                                                  java.lang.String firstname,
                                                                                  java.lang.String lastname,
                                                                                  java.lang.String picture_uri)
This method is invoked when the user has disconnected and reconnects to the Gateway with the new scope

参数：
SID -
userId -
username -
firstname -
lastname -
picture_uri -
返回：
client being updated in case of success, null otherwise

setUsernameAndSession

public org.apache.openmeetings.persistence.beans.room.Client setUsernameAndSession(java.lang.String SID,
                                                                                   java.lang.Long userId,
                                                                                   java.lang.String username,
                                                                                   java.lang.String firstname,
                                                                                   java.lang.String lastname)
this is set initial directly after login/loading language

参数：
SID - - id of the session
userId - - id of the user being set
username - - username of the user
firstname - - firstname of the user
lastname - - lastname of the user
返回：
RoomClient in case of everything is OK, null otherwise

syncMessageToCurrentScope

public void syncMessageToCurrentScope(java.lang.String remoteMethodName,
                                      java.lang.Object newMessage,
                                      boolean sendSelf)
General sync mechanism for all messages that are send from within the scope of the current client, but:
  • optionally do not send to self (see param: sendSelf)
  • do not send to clients that are screen sharing clients
  • do not send to clients that are audio/video clients (or potentially ones)
  • do not send to connections where no RoomClient is registered

参数：
remoteMethodName - The method to be called
newMessage - parameters
sendSelf - send to the current client as well

loadTestSyncMessage

@Deprecated
public boolean loadTestSyncMessage(java.lang.String remoteMethodName,
                                              java.lang.Object newMessage,
                                              boolean sendSelf)
已过时。 

Only temporary for load test, with return argument for the client to have a result

参数：
remoteMethodName -
newMessage -
sendSelf -
返回：
true

syncMessageToCurrentScope

public void syncMessageToCurrentScope(java.lang.String remoteMethodName,
                                      java.lang.Object newMessage,
                                      boolean sendSelf,
                                      boolean sendScreen)
General sync mechanism for all messages that are send from within the scope of the current client, but:
  • optionally do not send to self (see param: sendSelf)
  • send to clients that are screen sharing clients based on parameter
  • do not send to clients that are audio/video clients (or potentially ones)
  • do not send to connections where no RoomClient is registered

参数：
remoteMethodName - The method to be called
newMessage - parameters
sendSelf - send to the current client as well
sendScreen - send to the current client as well

sendMessageWithClient

public int sendMessageWithClient(java.lang.Object newMessage)
wrapper method

参数：
newMessage -
返回：
1 in case of success, -1 otherwise

已过时。 this method should be reworked to use a single SQL query in the cache to get any client in the current room that is recording instead of iterating through connections!

true in case there is recording session, false otherwise, null if any exception happend
